description:
These data are collected by the Alfred Wegener Institute (AWI) for
                                                                                          Polar and Marine Research, Bremerhaven for the Antarctica at the
                                                                                          Neumayer Ground Station (70S,8W) and at the research ship FS
                                                                                          Polarstern.
                                                                                          
                                                                                          Synoptic observations are carried out every 3 hours. They include
                                                                                          measurements of air temperature (at 2 m height), air pressure (values
                                                                                          are reduced to mean sea level), wind vector, dew point temperature (at
                                                                                          2 m height), clouds (cloud amount, type and height), horizontal
                                                                                          visibility, present and past weather and snowdrift.
                                                                                          
                                                                                          
                                                                                          The full program is carried out at 0, 9, 12, 15, 18, 21 UTC. During
                                                                                          night time at 3 and 6 UTC, the visual observations are omitted. The
                                                                                          data is coded (FM12-SYNOP) and transferred directly to the Global
                                                                                          Telecommunication System (GTS) by a Data Collecting Platform (DCP)
                                                                                          where they contribute to weather forecasting.
                                                                                          
                                                                                          At AWI the routine 3-hourly weather observation are archived together
                                                                                          with the data from the daily upper air soundings and surface radiation
                                                                                          and mast measurements in a relational database (SYBASE). Synoptic data
                                                                                          are available since 28 January 1981.  Actual observations normally
                                                                                          reach the database once a month.

title: Antarctic Meteorological Oberservations from the Neumayer Ground Station and Research Ship FS Polarstern
